About Me

Hi, my name’s David and I’m a resourceful system administrator consistently responding to a wide range of technical challenges with a focused and creative approach. Highly effective at problem solving and decision making.

I am currently learning: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jekyll and git.

Projects

Modern Resume Theme

github.com/Somdobomk/modern-resume-theme

A modern simple static resume template and theme. Powered by Jekyll and GitHub Pages.

This is a Jekyll theme that I found on GitHub and tailored it to my liking. This project has allowed me to use what I’ve been learning. It is my first open source project and hopefully it will be helpful for people as I learned from this myself.

A simple modern one page website.

This is my second open source project which is a simple modern one page website that allowed me to try to build something on my own without the use of tutorials.

When I'm Not Studying

When I’m not sat at my desk learning web development I will be enjoying one of my many other hobbies which include woodworking, auto mechanic, kayak bass fishing, trail biking, grilling/smoking bbq, pc gaming, tinkering with Linux home lab, or practicing for typing speed. Currently I have a max wpm of 120 and an avg of 90 when I’m not in a rush.
